About 15 Sleeper St Unit 406

Ideally located in the heart of the Seaport, this 2 bedroom is a coveted corner loft with oversized windows in every room. The desirable open floor plan features original beams, high ceilings & an abundance of natural light. Welcomed by a mudroom area complete with coat closet, the unit lays out beautifully with a spacious chef's kitchen open to the dining/living area. An oversized island offers plenty of counter space in addition to high-end appliances, double ovens & built-in water filtration system. The dining area is set up perfectly for family dinners or large gatherings, flowing seamlessly into the living room accented by custom built-ins & views of the Boston Harbor. The primary bedroom fits a king size bed & complete with an ensuite bath featuring double vanity & custom storage. The spacious 2nd bedroom includes a built-in murphy bed to create the perfect guest room and/or home office. Complete with central AC, in-unit laundry, additional storage & 1 full, deeded parking space.
